titleStmt.title: A vindication of truth, as held forth in a book, entituled, Love to the lost, from the lies, slanders and deceits of T. Higgenson, in a book, called, A testimony to thc [sic] true Iesus. But he is discovered to hold forth another Iesus then what the Scriptures hold forth, or the saints witness. / I.N.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black-Spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: "Love to the lost" is by Naylor.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black-Spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls.
